definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces

pinyin: Da4 wei4 · Mi3 li4 ban1 de2

definition: David Attenborough (1926-), British naturalist and broadcaster, author of Life on Earth 地球上的生物[di4 qiu2 shang4 de5 sheng1 wu4]
the Camp David agreement of 1978 brokered by President Jimmy Carter between Israel and Egypt

sentences.english: Kevin Huang and David Lin are classmates.
sentences.chinese: 黄课文和林大卫是同班同学。

sentences.english: And so the Moabites became David's servants, and brought gifts.
sentences.chinese: 摩押人就归服大卫，给他进贡。

sentences.english: Then David rose and went down to the wilderness of Paran.
sentences.chinese: 大卫起身，下到巴兰的旷野。

sentences.english: And the Philistine came on and drew near unto David; and the man that bare the shield went before him.
sentences.chinese: 非利士人也渐渐的迎着大卫来拿盾牌的走在前头。

sentences.english: King David's statue was made of bronze and it attracted many sculptors .
sentences.chinese: 大卫王的塑像是用青铜铸造的，吸引了无数的雕塑家。

sentences.english: The words of the Preacher, the son of David, king in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 在耶路撒冷作王，大卫的儿子，传道者的言语。

sentences.english: Then King David said, 'Call in Bathsheba.'
sentences.chinese: 大卫王吩咐说，叫拔示巴来。
然而，大卫的设计结果出了问题。

sentences.english: And he gathered together all the princes of Israel， with the priests and the Levites.
sentences.chinese: 大卫招聚以色列的众首领和祭司利未人。

sentences.english: And David said unto the young man that told him, Whence art thou?
sentences.chinese: 大卫问报信的少年人说，你是哪里的人。

sentences.english: He shows her what he has done so far and they discuss his ideas.
sentences.chinese: 大卫把他所写的样稿给她看，和她讨论了自己的想法。

sentences.english: David Jones rose to reply for the guests.
sentences.chinese: 大卫琼斯站起来代表来宾致答辞。

sentences.english: Daway, come and help me do a laundry.
There are some footballs under David's chair too.
sentences.chinese: 大卫的椅子下也有几个足球。

sentences.english: And David was then in an hold, and the garrison of the Philistines was then in Bethlehem.
sentences.chinese: 那时大卫在山寨，非利士人的防营在伯利恒。

definition: Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
